rows.label: qst202102_0010
rows.name:
Astounding!
So this is the ancient tablet!

rows.label: qst202102_0020
rows.name:
That's...
clearly more than just a stone slate...

rows.label: qst202102_0030
rows.name:
At least it looks like a tablet I guess.
Still, seems flimsy...

rows.label: qst202102_0040
rows.name: Is that...floating?

rows.label: qst202102_0050
rows.name: How about that weird little box? Suspicious...

rows.label: qst202102_0060
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst202102_0070
rows.name:
It looks like some sort of device for
showing pictures floating in thin air...

rows.label: qst202102_0080
rows.name: Hmm. What a bizarre idea...

rows.label: qst202102_0090
rows.name: What kind of scientific wizardry is this...?

rows.label: qst202102_0100
rows.name:
Truly, the ancients' grasp of technology
was on a level we could only dream of!

rows.label: qst202102_0110
rows.name: Shiki... Doesn't that look like writing?

rows.label: qst202102_0120
rows.name:
Oh?
Yeah, now you mention it!

rows.label: qst202102_0130
rows.name: It's cool if I have a fiddle about with it, right?

rows.label: qst202102_0140
rows.name:
No!
Zeke! It is not cool!

rows.label: qst202102_0150
rows.name: Uh, why?

rows.label: qst202102_0160
rows.name:
...You can't fiddle about with ancient artifacts!
What if you break something?!

rows.label: qst202102_0170
rows.name:
The construction looks delicate,
we have to handle it very carefully...

rows.label: qst202102_0180
rows.name: Sorry, I guess.

rows.label: qst202102_0190
rows.name: So... Did you find any ancient knowledge yet?

rows.label: qst202102_0200
rows.name: Not quite yet... Let's see.

rows.label: qst202102_0210
rows.name:
What's this now?
It's asking us to input some numbers or letters?

rows.label: qst202102_0220
rows.name:
One, two, three...
There's space for 12 characters in total.

rows.label: qst202102_0230
rows.name:
Ohhh, right...
I see now!

rows.label: qst202102_0240
rows.name: Any insight, Shiki?

rows.label: qst202102_0250
rows.name:
It's a challenge! The ancients are
challenging me to solve this riddle!

rows.label: qst202102_0260
rows.name: Now I'm feeling determined!

rows.label: qst202102_0270
rows.name:
Everyone! To solve the puzzle of this stone tablet,
I shall...retire to my room!

rows.label: qst202102_0280
rows.name: What?

rows.label: qst202102_0290
rows.name: Adios!

rows.label: qst202102_0300
rows.name: So...she's just gone...?

rows.label: qst202102_0310
rows.name: ...Yeah she's gone.
